languages.text: {n}Маражай чуть заметно наклоняет голову вбок, оценивающе разглядывая Калькасара. Однако ксенос не торопится высказать свои мысли вслух.{/n}
{n}Marazhai tilts his head slightly to the side, eyeing Calcazar appraisingly. However, the Drukhari is in no hurry to speak his thoughts aloud.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай чуть заметно наклоняет голову вбок, оценивающе разглядывая Калькасара. Однако ксенос не торопится высказать свои мысли вслух.{/n}

{n}Marazhai tilts his head slightly to the side, eyeing Calcazar appraisingly. However, the Drukhari is in no hurry to speak his thoughts aloud.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋微微歪着头，以评判的目光看着卡尔卡扎，但一点都不急于大声说出他的想法。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head slightly to the side, eyeing Calcazar appraisingly. However, the Drukhari is in no hurry to speak his thoughts aloud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋微微歪着头，以评判的目光看着卡尔卡扎，但一点都不急于大声说出他的想法。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai inclina la cabeza a un lado, estudiando a Calcazar. Sin embargo, no parece que el Drukhari tenga intención de expresar lo que piensa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head slightly to the side, eyeing Calcazar appraisingly. However, the Drukhari is in no hurry to speak his thoughts aloud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai inclina la cabeza a un lado, estudiando a Calcazar. Sin embargo, no parece que el Drukhari tenga intención de expresar lo que piensa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは首を傾げながら、カルカサルを注視している。しかし、デュカーリは急いではおらず、己の考えを声高に叫ぶことはしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head slightly to the side, eyeing Calcazar appraisingly. However, the Drukhari is in no hurry to speak his thoughts aloud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは首を傾げながら、カルカサルを注視している。しかし、デュカーリは急いではおらず、己の考えを声高に叫ぶことはしない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai incline légèrement la tête sur le côté en jaugeant Calcazar du regard, mais il ne semble pas particulièrement pressé d'exprimer le fond de sa pensée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head slightly to the side, eyeing Calcazar appraisingly. However, the Drukhari is in no hurry to speak his thoughts aloud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai incline légèrement la tête sur le côté en jaugeant Calcazar du regard, mais il ne semble pas particulièrement pressé d'exprimer le fond de sa pensée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai neigt den Kopf leicht zur Seite und mustert Calcazar. Doch der Drukhari macht keine Anstalten, seine Gedanken auszusprechen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head slightly to the side, eyeing Calcazar appraisingly. However, the Drukhari is in no hurry to speak his thoughts aloud.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai neigt den Kopf leicht zur Seite und mustert Calcazar. Doch der Drukhari macht keine Anstalten, seine Gedanken auszusprechen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, başını hafifçe yana eğip Calcazar'ı süzüyor. Drukhari, düşündüklerini söylemek için hiç acele etmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai tilts his head slightly to the side, eyeing Calcazar appraisingly. However, the Drukhari is in no hurry to speak his thoughts aloud.{/n}
